wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Ma̱nang a sak a̱ka̱shai na a̱ni, ku fa nyia̱ a shim [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use A̱yaaka̱nda̱n Nyian Ta̱m] ba, a̱wot a si̱si̱, di̱ mi̱n shyak fwuo á̱zanson, shim nwuak nwuat ang hu ca̱caat ma̱ng [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_Commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License Kwambwat a̱ka̱wat CC BY-SA 3.0] hu ma̱ng [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL] wu.
A shim hyperlink ku URL nyiung maai yong a̱pyia̱ nggu nang a̱di̱dam kaswuo a̱tafa kwambwat a̱ka̱wat Creative Commons hu.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Á̱ [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|ku fam mami a̱mgba̱m a̱yaawiki ba]], a̱vwuonswat IP ang ka.'''

A̱tyu wu a̱ fam wa yet $1 ($2).
Jat ji nang gu ku nwuak a̱ni ja yet ''$3''.

* Jen tsa fam hu: $4
* Jen tyiai fam hu: $5

A̱vwuonswat IP ang kya yet $6.
Ma̱sa̱kut mbeang a̱mgba̱m a̱cyuang nkhang tazwa na mami a̱mgba̱m lyip nang a nyia̱ a̱ni.

Ka̱ a nwuak a̱cucuk nyia̱ á̱ ku mi̱ nfam ang mi̱ ghyuap wa, da̱ a maai shyia̱ á̱ghyang nkhang ma̱ng tyiet mi̱ kwai nfwuo á̱niet a̱mgba̱m swanta si̱ [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|Á̱ nwai byia̱ á̱gang a̱yaawukili]] hu.
Kalak, ka̱ a cat a bwuo a̱lyiat tazwa fam hu, da̱ ma̱sa̱kut [[m:Steward requests/Global|ta̱m ma̱ng catkyang nyiung á̱ bu nwuan ang dyo mi̱ Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''Sava wukili a̱nyiung ku a̱yaasava wukili ma̱ a̱di̱di̱t nang a ku nyia̱ ta̱m ma̱ng mi̱ catkyang ang hu san [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|fwun ma̱ a̱mgba̱m swanta]].'''

A̱tyu wu a̱ nyia̱ fwun hu wa yet $1 ($2).
Jat ji nang gu nwuak a̱ni wa yet ''$3''.

* Tsa fwun hu: $4
* Tyiai fwun hu: $5

A̱vwuonswat wukili nang á̱ fwun kya zama yet $6.
Ma̱sa̱kut mbeang a̱mgba̱m a̱cyuang nkhang tazwa na mami a̱mgba̱m lilyip nang a nyia̱ a̱ni.

Ka̱ a nwuak a̱cucuk nyia̱ á̱ fwun ang ma̱ ghyuap wa, da̱ a maai shyia̱ á̱ghyang nkhang ma̱ng tyiet di̱ kwai fwuo a̱mgba̱m swanta si̱ [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|Á̱ nwai byia̱ á̱gang a̱yaawukili]] hu.
Kalak, ka̱ a cat bwuo a̱lyiat tazwa fwun hu ma̱sa̱kut [[m:Steward requests/Global|ta̱m ma̱ng catkyang nyiung mat á̱ bu nwuan ang dyo mi̱ Meta-Wiki]].
